title: How TO - List Group

metadata.description: Learn about How TO - List Group with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Learn how to transform a basic list into a "list group" with CSS. List Group Adele Agnes Billy Bob Calvin Christina Cindy How To Create a List Group Step 1) Add HTML: Example
  • Adele
  • Agnes
  • Billy
  • Bob
  • Calvin
  • Christina
  • Cindy
Step 2) Add CSS: Example ul { list-style-type: none; /* Remove bullets */ padding: 0; /* Remove padding */ margin: 0; /* Remove margins */ } ul li { border: 1px solid #ddd; /* Add a thin border to each list item */ margin-top: -1px; /* Prevent double borders */ background-color: #f6f6f6; /* Add a grey background color */ padding: 12px; /* Add some padding */ } Tip: Go to our CSS List Tutorial to learn more about HTML lists and how to style them. ★ +1
